objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><radialGradient id='bg' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1A1A1A'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#000000'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='glow1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FF8C00;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FF4500;stop-opacity:0'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='glow2' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFA500;stop-opacity:0.5'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FF6347;stop-opacity:0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg)'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='#111111'/><path d='M0,0 Q270,200 0,400 Q270,600 0,800 Q270,1000 0,1080 L540,1080 L540,0 Z' fill='#181818'/><circle cx='100' cy='200' r='150' fill='url(#glow1)' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='450' cy='850' r='200' fill='url(#glow2)' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='250' cy='500' r='5' fill='#FF6347' opacity='0.8'/><circle cx='150' cy='350' r='3' fill='#FFA500' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='380' cy='700' r='4' fill='#FF8C00' opacity='0.6'/><circle cx='420' cy='200' r='3' fill='#FF6347' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='100' cy='650' r='4' fill='#FFA500' opacity='0.8'/><circle cx='300' cy='800' r='3' fill='#FF8C00' opacity='0.6'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Premium Space Gray aluminum case
   with sleek black sport band
• Brilliant OLED Retina display with
   stunning fire bloom watch face
• Always-On display technology for
   constant time visibility

product_details.name: Next-Gen Apple Watch: Featuring Stunning Fire Bloom Display
product_details.description:
• Premium Space Gray aluminum case with sleek black sport band
• Brilliant OLED Retina display with stunning fire bloom watch face
• Always-On display technology for constant time visibility
• Digital Crown for precise navigation and control
• Water-resistant design for everyday wear
• Custom watch faces with mesmerizing animations
• Durable Ion-X strengthened glass screen
• Seamless integration with iOS devices
• Advanced health and fitness tracking capabilities
• Up to 18 hours of battery life

banner_details:
The banner prominently advertises a high-tech smartwatch on a sleek, modern layout divided into two sections. The left half features various text elements, including a main title (`heading`), a feature highlight (`subheading`), a catchy slogan (`tagline`), a list of product benefits (`description`), a limited-time offer message (`offer_text`), the price (`price`), and a clear call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`). The right half showcases the product with a realistic image (`product_image`). The backdrop features gradients, soft glows, and radial ornaments (`background`), creating a sense of depth and energy.  

**Color Palette:**  
- Jet Black: `#000000`  
- Dark Gray: `#111111`, `#181818`  
- White: `#FFFFFF`  
- Fire Orange: `#FF6347`  
- Amber: `#FFA500`  
- Dark Orange: `#FF8C00`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek black smartwatch with a captivating dial design. The color palette primarily features deep black (#000000) for the band and casing, providing a modern and premium base. The watch face displays golden amber hues (#C47E3B) and rich copper tones (#8B4C2B), transitioning smoothly into darker gradients for depth and fluidity. Highlights of bright white (#FFFFFF) are used for the watch hands, ensuring visibility and contrast. The blending of fiery golds with high-gloss black creates an elegant yet bold look. For promotional banners, use black, gold, copper, and white to maintain luxury and technological sophistication.
